title: Biggles: Adventures in Time 1986 (Sci-Fi, War) The Ultimate Weapon. The Ultimate Hero.

sources.title: Biggles: Adventures in Time 1986 (Sci-Fi, War) The Ultimate Weapon. The Ultimate Hero.
sources.description:
Meet Jim Ferguson. He lived a daring double-life with one foot in the 20th century and the other in World War I.
Daring British WWI fighter pilot James "Biggles" Bigglesworth and 1980s low-level business executive Jim Ferguson discover that they can time travel to each other's eras. They try to stop the Germans from changing the outcome of WWI.

Original title: Biggles: Adventures in Time (1986)

Director: John Hough
Writers: W.E. Johns, John Groves, Kent Walwin
Stars: Neil Dickson, Alex Hyde-White, Fiona Hutchison
Genres: Adventure, Sci-Fi, War


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:57 James Ferguson stumbles upon strange events and meets Biggles, a time traveler with a mission.
10:34 A thrilling time-travel adventure thrusts James into World War I, filled with unexpected twists.
22:59 Sent back in time, James must stop the enemy from changing history with a deadly secret weapon.
31:17 Time-traveling agent Biggles faces dangerous foes and allies in a high-stakes mission during World War I.
39:22 A wild time-travel adventure in World War I involves a psychiatrist, a nun's disguise, and a powerful weapon.
49:59 A heroic pilot leads a daring escape, facing enhanced weapons and perilous skies in a thrilling chase.
1:12:50 Amidst chaos, a daring mission to destroy a devastating weapon and protect civilians leads to a surprising wedding celebration.


@CultCinemaClassics
